feed.title: Justin Palmer
feed.subtitle: I am writing about my experiences as a naval navel-gazer.

entry.title: Modern Art Critic Hero
entry.content:
Modern Art Critic Hero is a microgame based on the theme 'Combine Two Incompatible Genres'. Play as The Critic on their personal journey to critique as much modern art as they can. Explore the museum and contemplate life, existence, and the exhibits.

Modern Art Critic Hero won 4th place for Humor in Ludum Dare 41.

entry.title: The Witching Hour
entry.content: The Witching Hour is a horror microgame created in 48 hours at Global Game Jam 2018. The jam theme was Transmission. The player must keep possessed appliances quiet, or suffer the wrath of an evil spirit that haunts the house.

entry.title: Update time!
entry.content:
Oh, how time flies when you're having fun. I haven't updated this place in about a month! Time to fix that.

More soon!

entry.title: Pardon the dust...
entry.content:
You'll have to forgive me, I decided to rework my portfolio/blog from scratch. I was running static HTML/CSS on an Amazon S3 bucket, and finally decided it was high time to do things "the right way". This site utilizes 11ty as a statc content generator, and I'm using GitHub and TravisCI for version control, hosting, and CI/CD.

I probably should have learned how to properly use all these tools first before taking my old portfolio down. Whoops! #MVP

Anyway, please excuse the dust around here. I haven't stretched my web design skills in a hot minute. I've been laser focused on Unity Development and Level Design lately.
